entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Workload Feature Band Test Sometimes Fails #45314
    10.0.1xx
  • Template engine tests hitting known parallelism issue in GetVisualStudioInstances #44878
    10.0.1xx
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
    10.0.1xx
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
    10.0.1xx
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    10.0.1xx
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
    10.0.1xx
  • Failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
    10.0.1xx
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
    10.0.1xx
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
    10.0.1xx
  • Links to app.config is case sensitive #2768
    Discussion
  • Prepare tool for installation on 2.1 and using CLI extensibility model on 2.0 #9492
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • [dotnet-watch] Microsoft.DotNet.HotReload.Agent.PipeRpc source package #45603
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Use managed Mach-O signer on non-Mac hosts #45019
    area-Host, untriaged
  • Do not create custom instances of TestAssetsManager in tests, use SdkTest base instead #45071
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Static web assets] Be more leanient when applying compression negotiation #45598
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Agent fixes #45369
    untriaged, Area-Watch
  • Warn on :: use in dotnet new install towards #45422 #45552
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support package@version syntax in dotnet new install, partial fix for #45422 #45545
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
